FX.name: HPS
FX.description: This intelligent pitch shifter outputs the effect sound with the pitch shifted according to scale and key settings.

Parameters.name: Scale
Parameters.explanation: Sets the pitch of the pitch-shifted sound added to the original sound.

Parameters.name: Key
Parameters.explanation: Sets the tonic (root) of the scale used for pitch shifting.

Parameters.name: Mix
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the amount of effected sound that is mixed with the original sound.
